thread.title: A Vietnam mega casino rises with Macau money

title: A Vietnam mega casino rises with Macau money
text:
A Vietnam mega casino rises with Macau money 5:54am EDT - 02:06 
Next year Vietnam's biggest casino is set to open on a stretch of quiet coastline near the holiday city of Da Nang. At the heart of the $4 billion project is a Macau-based junket who've risen from obscurity in less than a decade.
